title: create_new_category
description: Test creating a new category with valid name and optional parentId to verify hierarchical category creation.

title: get_all_categories_with_hierarchy_option
description: Test retrieving all categories with and without the hierarchy query parameter to verify correct hierarchical data retrieval.

title: get_category_by_id
description: Test retrieving a category by its ID to verify correct category data is returned or 404 if not found.

title: update_category_by_id
description: Test updating a category's name and parentId by ID to verify successful update or 404 if category does not exist.

title: delete_category_by_id
description: Test deleting a category by ID to verify successful deletion or 404 if category does not exist.

title: create_new_quiz
description: Test creating a new quiz with required fields (title, categoryId) and optional fields (description, difficulty, timeLimit) to verify validation and successful creation.

title: get_all_quizzes_with_category_filter
description: Test retrieving all quizzes with and without categoryId filter to verify correct filtering and data retrieval.

title: get_quiz_by_id_with_details
description: Test retrieving a quiz by ID including full details with questions and answers to verify correct data or 404 if not found.

title: update_quiz_by_id
description: Test updating quiz details by ID to verify successful update or 404 if quiz does not exist.

title: delete_quiz_by_id
description: Test deleting a quiz by ID to verify successful deletion or 404 if quiz does not exist.
